title: If I were a Vayne main (an Ode to Rito)
body:
Hey Rito, I wrote you some lines (I'm terrible at art but you know, stuff), is there anychance u could hook it with 50 orange essence?

If i were a Vayne main,
IE and shiv,
there'd be no answer,
to the crits that I give

If I were a Vayne main,
I'd tumble, condemn,
win every game,
boost all my friends

If I were a Vayne main,
level 7 and all,
I press my R key
and make my enemies fall

If I were a Vayne main,
I'd trigger the tanks,
give my support all the s ranks,
they'd give me their thanks

If I were a Vayne main,
maybe they'd care,
if I penta'd or carried,
maybe they'd cheer

If I were a Vayne main,
surely I'd be
the single greatest player,
in league of legends history

If I were a Vayne main,
challenger plays you'd all see,
but I main Udyr and Zyra,
and I'm stuck in bronze III

Cheers.

replies.body: Thats surely worth more than 50 orange essence xDD
